trans-unit.source: Defines methods and properties that a <xref href="System.Windows.Data.CollectionView"></xref> implements to enable specifying adding items of a specific type.
trans-unit.target: 定义一些方法和属性， <xref href="System.Windows.Data.CollectionView"> </xref>实现，若要指定特定类型的添加项。

trans-unit.source: The IEditableCollectionViewAddNewItem interface enables application developers to specify what type of object to add to a collection.
trans-unit.target: IEditableCollectionViewAddNewItem 接口使应用程序开发人员能够指定要添加到集合对象的类型。

trans-unit.source: This interface extends <xref:System.ComponentModel.IEditableCollectionView>, so you can add, edit, and remove items in a collection.
trans-unit.target: 此接口扩展<xref:System.ComponentModel.IEditableCollectionView>，因此您可以添加、 编辑和删除集合中的项。</xref:System.ComponentModel.IEditableCollectionView>

trans-unit.source: IEditableCollectionViewAddNewItem adds the <xref:System.ComponentModel.IEditableCollectionViewAddNewItem.AddNewItem%2A> method, which takes an object that is added to the collection.
trans-unit.target: IEditableCollectionViewAddNewItem 添加<xref:System.ComponentModel.IEditableCollectionViewAddNewItem.AddNewItem%2A>方法，采用对象添加到集合。</xref:System.ComponentModel.IEditableCollectionViewAddNewItem.AddNewItem%2A>

trans-unit.source: This method is useful when the collection and objects that you want to add have one or more of the following characteristics: - The objects in the <xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView> are different types.
trans-unit.target: 集合和你想要添加的对象具有一个或多个以下特性时，此方法非常有用:-中的对象<xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView>是不同的类型。</xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView>

trans-unit.source: - The objects do not have a default constructor.
trans-unit.target: -对象没有默认构造函数。

trans-unit.source: - The object already exists.
trans-unit.target: -将对象已存在。

trans-unit.source: - You want to add a `null` object to the collection.
trans-unit.target: -你想要添加`null`到集合的对象。

trans-unit.source: Adds the specified object to the collection.
trans-unit.target: 将指定的对象添加到集合。

trans-unit.source: When you calling the AddNewItem method, it begins an add transaction.
trans-unit.target: 当你调用 AddNewItem 方法，它将开始添加事务。

trans-unit.source: You should call the <xref:System.ComponentModel.IEditableCollectionView.CommitNew%2A> or <xref:System.ComponentModel.IEditableCollectionView.CancelNew%2A> methods to end the add transaction.
trans-unit.target: 应调用<xref:System.ComponentModel.IEditableCollectionView.CommitNew%2A>或<xref:System.ComponentModel.IEditableCollectionView.CancelNew%2A>方法来结束添加事务。</xref:System.ComponentModel.IEditableCollectionView.CancelNew%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.IEditableCollectionView.CommitNew%2A>

trans-unit.source: A new item always appears in the collection view.
trans-unit.target: 始终在集合视图中将出现一个新项。

trans-unit.source: Any filtering, sorting, or grouping that is applied to the view is applied to the new item when <xref:System.ComponentModel.IEditableCollectionView.CommitNew%2A> is called.
trans-unit.target: 任何筛选、 排序或分组操作也将应用于该视图应用到新项时<xref:System.ComponentModel.IEditableCollectionView.CommitNew%2A>称为。</xref:System.ComponentModel.IEditableCollectionView.CommitNew%2A>

trans-unit.source: The object to add to the collection.
trans-unit.target: 要添加到集合的对象。

trans-unit.source: The object that is added to the collection.
trans-unit.target: 添加到集合的对象。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether a specified object can be added to the collection.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示是否可以将指定的对象添加到集合。

trans-unit.source: If the CanAddNewItem property is `true`, you can specify an object to add to the collection by calling the <xref:System.ComponentModel.IEditableCollectionViewAddNewItem.AddNewItem%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 如果 CanAddNewItem 属性为`true`，你可以指定通过调用添加到集合的对象<xref:System.ComponentModel.IEditableCollectionViewAddNewItem.AddNewItem%2A>方法。</xref:System.ComponentModel.IEditableCollectionViewAddNewItem.AddNewItem%2A>

trans-unit.source: CanAddNewItem is `false` if items cannot be added to the collection by using <xref:System.ComponentModel.IEditableCollectionViewAddNewItem.AddNewItem%2A>.
trans-unit.target: CanAddNewItem 是`false`如果无法通过使用<xref:System.ComponentModel.IEditableCollectionViewAddNewItem.AddNewItem%2A>。</xref:System.ComponentModel.IEditableCollectionViewAddNewItem.AddNewItem%2A>向集合添加项

trans-unit.source: If CanAddNewItem is `false`, you may still be able to add an object by using the <xref:System.ComponentModel.IEditableCollectionView.AddNew%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method.
trans-unit.target: 如果 CanAddNewItem `false`，你可能仍将能够通过使用添加对象<xref:System.ComponentModel.IEditableCollectionView.AddNew%2A?displayProperty=fullName>方法。</xref:System.ComponentModel.IEditableCollectionView.AddNew%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: For example, you can add objects to an ADO.NET source by using <xref:System.ComponentModel.IEditableCollectionView.AddNew%2A>, but not by using <xref:System.ComponentModel.IEditableCollectionViewAddNewItem.AddNewItem%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 例如，你可以通过将对象添加到 ADO.NET 源使用<xref:System.ComponentModel.IEditableCollectionView.AddNew%2A>，但不能通过使用<xref:System.ComponentModel.IEditableCollectionViewAddNewItem.AddNewItem%2A>.</xref:System.ComponentModel.IEditableCollectionViewAddNewItem.AddNewItem%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.IEditableCollectionView.AddNew%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if a specified object can be added to the collection; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果指定的对象可以添加到集合;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。
